summary: WHILE DRIVING 15 MPH THE DRIVER SUDDENLY HEARD A POP AND THEN THE  DRIVER AND PASSENGERS SEAT BELTS BEGAN TO RETRACT INTO THE  RETRACTOR. THE CONSUMER ALSO STARTED TO SMELL GAS.   *NLM   ALL FOUR OF THE VEHICLE OCCUPIED SEAT BELTS BECAME TIGHT AND THE SIRS LIGHT ILLUMINATED.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE DRIVER AND FRONT PASSENGER SEAT BELTS ALONG WITH BOTH REAR SEAT BELT ASSEMBLIES.  THE SIRS CONTROL MODULE WAS ALSO REPLACED.  *CB   *NLM
